<h1 style="font-size:2.5em; text-align:center; margin-top:0;">

<p><strong>Dates:</strong> Thursday–Friday, <strong>November 20–21, 2025</strong></p>

<p>Welcome, SCMM community! We’re excited to host the <strong>22nd Annual SCMM</strong> in Houston, TX.</p>

<p>This year, we are introducing a new <strong>trainee networking event</strong>: a bag-lunch session on Thursday designed to connect trainees with professionals across venture capital, bench science, science writing, and academia. Details will be emailed to registered trainees.</p>

<hr>

<h2>Quick links &amp; deadlines</h2>
<ul>
  <li><strong>Register by October 17, 2025:</strong> <a href="https://redcap.sph.uth.edu/surveys/?s=RAMYDRL4AAWHHYKJ">Register »</a></li>
  <li><strong>Submit your abstract by November 7, 2025:</strong> <a href="https://redcap.sph.uth.edu/surveys/?s=FYPJAHTFN8M8XNNH">Submit abstract »</a></li>
  <li><strong>Special hotel rate $149 — book by November 15, 2025:</strong> <a href="https://www.marriott.com/event-reservations/reservation-link.mi?id=1756991742828&key=GRP&app=resvlink">Book hotel »</a></li>
  <li>Please <strong>share</strong> with trainees and colleagues!</li>
</ul>

<hr>

<h2>Venue</h2>
<p><strong>BRC (BioScience Research Collaborative)</strong><br>
6500 Main St., Houston, TX 77030<br>
Conference rooms: BRC Event Hall</p>

<p><strong>Parking Information</strong></p>
<p>We strongly encourage attendees to walk or park at the conference hotel whenever possible. Limited parking is available at the BRC Garage for those who need it, but spaces are not guaranteed. For evening festivities, a shuttle will run between the BRC, Valhalla, and Hungry’s, and back to the hotel, so cars are not needed at the conference venue Our student ambassadors will also be there to help escort those who wish to walk to dinner. Everything is in close proximity. </p>

<p><strong>BRC Garage Details</strong></p>
<p>For those who wish to park at BRC, the garage entrance is located off <strong>Dryden Rd.</strong> Parking is <strong>credit-card only</strong>:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Insert your credit card at the entrance gate to enter (your card acts as a placeholder; no charge until exit).</li>
  <li>Park in any available space and take the elevator to the <strong>first floor</strong> of the BRC.</li>
  <li>Use the same credit card at the exit gate to pay when leaving.</li>
  <li>Press the call button at the gate for any issues.</li>
</ul>
